name: Santa Training - Oculus VR
description:
This is a little project I made for our family to play on Christmas Day.  Steer your reindeer using the reins and collect all the presents. Designed for sitting play but can be played standing up. Make sure to reset hand position using ' B ' before you start.  Oculus Rift only.

Controls:

  • Hands forward - speed up
  • Hands towards body - slow down
  • Hands up - climb
  • Hands down - descend
  • Left hand closer to body - turn left
  • Right hand closer to body - turn right
  • B - set neutral hand position
  • A - start game
  • Click Thumbstick - restart game

Scoring:

  • Collect Present - 50
  • Collect Santa's Hat - 250 points and one minute added
  • Each second remaining if all collected - 25
